title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and Go library to pull, create, and run GGUF models locally with a built-in REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, list, pull, push models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same coverage as Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter that plugs Ollama models into chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: llama-index-llms-ollama
summary: LlamaIndex LLM integration; run local Ollama models for RAG and agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI that talks to any Ollama model via REST.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library wrapping the Ollama REST API with POJO models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for chatting and generating text with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with conversation memory and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline code suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack component to run Ollama models in production-grade NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: RAG, function-calling, fine-tune, Docker, k8s, and more.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) and Docker Compose examples.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that summarises notes and answers questions using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app to chat with Ollama models on Windows/macOS/Linux.

title: ollama.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin for generating code, docs, and unit tests via Ollama.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model-Context-Protocol server exposing Ollama as a backend for Claude Desktop & friends.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Bot bringing Ollama models into Telegram chats with per-user quotas and streaming.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot slash-command integration for chatting with local Ollama models.
